name: The Right Todd
description:
A  hot guy named Todd got locked in a box by his friend Todd.

He needs you to find the right Todd and get the key before he runs out of air. 

Can you figure out which Todd is the Right Todd?

CONTROLS

Spacebar - Progress dialogue

Mouse - Drag and drop clues

Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2021 with Construct 3, Procreate and Photoshop.

Photos lovingly gleaned from Unsplash. SFX delicately plucked from Freesound.org. Art and everything else by me!

Music by Stephan Siebert.
